DOC.brief_summary: Abbott Vascular ( AV ) obtain market approval XIENCE PRIME Everolimus Eluting Coronary Stent System ( XIENCE PRIME EECSS ) China China Food Drug Administration ( CFDA ) August 10th , 2011 . This prospective , observational , open-label , multi-center , single-arm , post-approval study design evaluate continue safety effectiveness XIENCE PRIME EECSS cohort real-world patient receive XIENCE PRIME EECSS commercial use real-world setting China . This study primary outcome measure . All observation equal weight .
DOC.brief_title: XIENCE PRIME Everolimus Eluting Coronary Stent System ( EECSS ) China Single-Arm Study
DOC.criteria: The patient must least 18 year age time sign informed consent . The patient his/her legallyauthorized representative sign ECapproved Informed Consent Form ( ICF ) . Only XIENCE PRIME stent ( ) ( ) implant index procedure . No exclusion criterion specify study .
